echo PING PING | tr A-Z a-z
echo PING PING > pipeboi.txt; cat < pipeboi.txt | tr A-Z a-z
echo ping | tee destroy.txt | tr a-z a-z >> destroy.txt; cat destroy.txt
echo ping ping | tr a-z A-Z | tr A-Z a-z | cat
echo ping | tr a-z A-Z | timetoCRASH || echo ping ping
ech ping | tr a-z A-Z && echo ping ping
